title: Shop LolClient
body: Everytime I go into the Shop in the Pve There are these sliders at the bottom and the left which is annoying because I cant just use my mouse wheel I have to use my mouse or my trackpad and 1/5 of the shop is gone because of the left to right slider so I have to slide onto that side too

replies.body: I'm not sure exactly what your issue is, so a screenshot would definitely be helpful. Unfortunately, the two comments you posted don't link to a screenshot and contain information that may be sensitive, so I recommend deleting those two comments. I suggest uploading the screenshot to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/) or [Gyazo](https://gyazo.com/) and posting the link to the image here. Thanks!
Here is the Image to show my problem [](http:///Users/ethanung/Desktop/Screen Shot 2016-07-25 at 12.40.13 PM.png)
[](http:///Users/ethanung/Desktop/Screen Shot 2016-07-25 at 12.40.13 PM.png) this is the screen shot for the problem I have plz reply :D
